column14: Description
column25: Task

column14: As a registered user, I wish to manage my reservation so that I can purchase ticket and reach to the destination quickly.
As a staff, I want to manage the bus schedule information so that all the bus schedule will be updated in the first time.
As a registered user, I can make payment for my reservation so that I can complete my reservation
As a registered user, I can log into the system so that I can use the system for my daily task which is the ticketing service
As a staff, I can generate reports so that I can understand specific information with graphs
As a staff, I can manage membership so that membership details are always up-to-date
As a manager, I wish to manage all the staff accounts so that the staff information is up-to-date
As a manager, I can manage driver information so that the driver information is always up-to-date.
As a manager, I can manage route information so that the route information is always up-to-date
As a manager, I can manage bus information so that the bus information is always up-to-date
As a manager, I can manage price rate information so that the price rate information is always up-to-date
A a registered user, I wish to create reservation so that i can purchase the ticket
